page.title: 08 Farming
page.content: Farming is the major industry in this area.The land is owned by 4 different people.We were lucky enough to be able to interview the manager of the farm which covers the top half of our section.Here are some facts about the farm now. There are 690 cows.Each cow gives approximately 48 pints of milk per day and has one calf every year.Heifer calves are kept,the others are fattened for beef(at 2 years old).Cows are milked by machines and it takes 4-5 minutes to milk each one.They are fed with cake which is a mixture of barley, wheat, oats, and protien.There are 20 hereford bulls on the farm. The farm has 2 combine harvesters(each of which costs Â£50,000 ).There are 800 acres of corn and each combine(12 feet wide)can cut between
